name: Veez Mega Bot
description: Create your own bot to stream music trought the new Telegram video chat feature.

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

ASS_ID.description: fill with the telegram id of account you used for the assistant/userbot

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: create a private group and get the group id, add your bot as admin to the group too

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: The duration limit of the video allowed to play

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

MONGO_DB_URI.description: fill with the mongodb url get from mongodb.cloud.com
